title: On-site Maintenance, Gated Garage Parking
map_address: 7017 South Buffalo Drive near West Badura Avenue
posting_body: ['Welcome home to The Wyatt', 'The Wyatt apartments in the Spring Valley section of Las Vegas, NV are situated in a sophisticated neighborhood near everything you need and want.', 'Exciting luxuries of the famous Strip are close by, and many places are open day and night.', 'Take advantage of being a local for even more entertainment opportunities Down Town.', 'With shopping, diverse restaurants, and plenty of places for relaxation, you will feel right at home and have so much fun living here.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 121', 'OR Text', '121', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 836 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Disability Access', '- Refrigerator', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Views Available', '- Dishwasher', '- 9Ft Ceilings', '- Pantry', '- Upgraded Bathrooms', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Washer and Dryer in Home', '- Disposal', '- Wood Plank Style Floors', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Cable Ready', '- All-electric Gourmet Kitchen', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Central Air and Heating', '- Solid Surface Countertops', '- Balcony or Patio', '- Tile Floors', '- Carpeted Floors', '- Mini Blinds', '- Microwave', '*', 'In Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Copy and Fax Services', '- Cable Available', '- Disability Access', '- State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '- Easy Access to Shopping', '- Short-term Leasing Available', '- Public Parks Nearby', '- Library and Theater Room', '- High-speed Internet Access', '- Movie Theater', '- Clubhouse', '- Security Cameras', '- Electric Vehicle Charging Station', '- On-site Maintenance', '- Assigned Parking (attached garage on townhomes; detached garage available for rent)', '- Bike Storage', '- Poolside Cabanas', '- Covered Parking', '- 24-hour Fitness Center with Water Service', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- Guest Parking', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- On-site Recyling', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- 24-hour Courtesy Patrol', '- Play Area', '- Resort-style Swimming Pool', '- Business Center with Equipment', '- Splash Pad', '- On-call Maintenance', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Starbucks Coffee Bar', '- Soothing Spa', '- Gated Garage Parking', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Limit of 2 pets per home.', 'Maximum adult weight is 25 pounds.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'The Wyatt', '7017 South Buffalo Drive, Las Vegas, NV, 89113', 'f3TxSi3d']
